2501.name: DEVICE_MISMATCH
2501.message:
You cannot use this Nintendo Network
ID on this system.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com
2501.short_description: The console certificate sent in the request was invalid or missing.
2501.long_description: The console certificate sent in the request was invalid or missing.
2501.short_solution: Ensure your console certificate is untampered with and try again later. If using Citra, dump your system files again.
2501.long_solution: Ensure your console certificate is untampered with and try again later. If using Citra, dump your system files again.
